note.p: Physician, homoeopath, and theosophist. MD, Edinburgh, 1851. Physician at the Hahnemann Hospital, Bloomsbury Square, London, a homoeopathic institution that existed from October 1850 to August 1852. Acting president of the British Homeopathic Society, 1876. Founder member of the Liberal Unionist Party, 1887.

p.hi: Sue Young histories: biographies of homeopaths
